divs: Sighting Detailswatched silvery star-like craft in between cloud cover move from south to southwest for 7 minutes.looked through scope & seen it was NOT a star. no blinking lights but very bright steady light.at one point the craft had clouds above it so I know it was in airplane flight range.much bigger than an airplane at that height.my kids saw it first while playing outside.it just vanished all at once while looking at it.
Summary: watched silvery star-like craft hover & move very slowly
trends: There have been no other sightings in pelham
This sighting has never been favorited.
